Book your table at Silas Cove

Ready to enjoy fresh, delicious food with a stunning sea view? Whether you're planning a casual lunch, a special dinner, or a gathering with friends and family, booking ahead guarantees your spot at Silas Cove.



Booking details

Lunch service: 12pm ­ 3pm

Dinner service: 5:30pm ­ 8pm

Reservation policy: We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance. For larger groups, please contact us directly.

Special requests: Let us know if you have any dietary preferences or special occasions to celebrate.
